articles.title: Gold price in India falls slightly for 24 carat / 22 carat - Kalinga TV
articles.description: Bhubaneswar: Gold rates for 24 carat/ 22 carat has slightly decreased by Rs 30 in the last 24 hours in India.As on May 11 (Thursday), 24 carat gold (10 grams) cost Rs 62,130 while 22 carat (10 grams) costs Rs 56,950.Major cities in India registered c
